_comments: We use NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider to avoid an issue between deps and node>=17
This is ok because we do not have external network interaction during doc building.
scripts.docs:dev: python docs/autodoc.py && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vuepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: python docs/autodoc.py && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vuepress build docs && touch docs/.vuepress/dist/.nojekyll
